summary: This module implements the integration layer for IBM watsonx.ai within the litellm framework. It provides a client wrapper that constructs and sends requests for text generation and vector embeddings, maps OpenAI‑style parameters to watsonx equivalents, manages authentication tokens, supports both synchronous and asynchronous streaming, and parses the service responses into unified model and usage objects.
business_intent: Allow developers to leverage IBM watsonx.ai for generating AI completions and embeddings without dealing with low‑level API details, enabling seamless inclusion of Watsonx capabilities in applications that use litellm.
